t: This*p is what the Lord*s says: Where*pn is your mother’s divorce certificate that*ln I used to send her away? Or*ln to which of my creditors did I sell you? Look,*ln you were sold for your iniquities, and*ln your mother was sent away because*ln of your transgressions.

Why*ln was no one there when I came? Why*ln was there no one to answer when I called? Is*ln my arm too weak to redeem? Or*ln do I have no power to rescue? Look,*ln I dry up the sea by my rebuke; I*ln turn the rivers into a wilderness; their*ln fish rot because of lack of water and*ln die of thirst.
I*ln dress the heavens in black and*ln make sackcloth their covering.

The*pn Lord God*s has given me the*ln tongue of those who are instructed to*ln know how to sustain the weary with a word. He*ln awakens me each morning; he*ln awakens my ear to listen like those being instructed.
The*ln Lord God*s has opened my ear, and*ln I was not rebellious; I*ln did not turn back.
I*ln gave my back to those who beat me, and*ln my cheeks to those who tore out my beard. I*ln did not hide my face from scorn and spitting.
The*pn Lord God*s will help me; therefore*ln I have not been humiliated; therefore*ln I have set my face like flint, and*ln I know I will not be put to shame.
The*ln one who vindicates me is near; who*ln will contend with me? Let*ln us confront each other. Who*ln has a case against me? Let*ln him come near me!
In*pn truth, the Lord God*s will help me; who*ln will condemn me? Indeed,*ln all of them will wear out like a garment; a*ln moth will devour them.
Who*ln among you fears the Lord*s and*ln listens to his servant? Who*ln among you walks in darkness, and*ln has no light? Let*ln him trust in the name of the Lord;*s let*ln him lean on his God.

Look,*ln all you who kindle a fire, who*ln encircle yourselves with torches; walk*ln in the light of your fire and*ln of the torches you have lit! This*ln is what you’ll get from my hand: you*ln will lie down in a place of torment.
